Authentication Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

This dialog box appears when you perform an operation that requires access to password-protected VIs.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Password—Enter the password for the specified VI.
  • Verify—If you know the password for the specified VI, enter the password in the Password field and click Verify.
  • Skip—If you do not know the password for the specified VI, click Skip to ignore the specified VI and move on to the next VI without cancelling the operation.
  • Cancel—To stop the operation, click Cancel.
  • Skip remaining password prompts for this operation—If you do not have the passwords for any of the password-protected VIs that the operation needs to access, place a checkmark in the Skip remaining password prompts for this operation checkbox and click Skip. LabVIEW then stops prompting you for passwords during the operation. If you do not have the password for the specified VI but would like to continue receiving password prompts for the rest of the operation, leave the Skip remaining password prompts for this operation empty and click Skip.
Note  When you try to access a single password-protected VI and LabVIEW prompts you for a password, the Authentication dialog box displays only the Verify and Cancel buttons.
